question: Who amongst the following Muslims did lift the bier of Bal Gangadhar Tilak along with Mahatma Gandhi?
explanation: Bal Gangadhar Tilak or Lokmanya Tilak was an Indian nationalist, teacher, and an independence activist. He was an ardent follower of Swaraj and died on 1 August 1920. Among others who shouldered the bier by turn were Mahatma Gandhi, Lala Lajpat Rai, Shaukat Ali.
